just click a box...

Unova, probably the most beloved region in the Pokemon series, and the most hated as well...(Seriously, you guys can't make up your mind)

But at least we get the option to pick two sets of protagonist this time, so that's nice.

Okay, Unova does have a lot of great gym leaders, so chose.



...


That's all I got...

...

It exist.

11531.title: Kalos

11532.content: Alola, A very tropical setting, and a wonderfully relaxing region. (BUT NOT FOR LONG!)
11532.title: Alola

12.content:
Alright, even though I watched the anime whenever I got the chance, I'm not really an expert on the Pokemon anime. so I'm just gonna go by the regions.

This will be just for the anime exclusive characters and the characters already in the game with different motives and personality's from the anime.
(I mean, those personalty's and motives can also be in the main series section, but what do i know?)
12.title: Anime

122.content:
Following a strange meteor shower, in which strange glowing particles could be seen falling from the sky, the region of Kanto began experiencing a phenomenon thought to only happen in the Galar region: Power Spots began appearing, locations where Dynamax energy leaked out to be harnessed by Pokemon with a Wishing Stone. However, something was strange about this energy that baffled researchers, something they couldn't quite place... that is, until one person stumbled upon one of these spots.

(It was taking too long for one of these branches to go anywhere.)
122.title: Kanto Characters

1223.content: More options, Team Rocket girls.
1223.title: Someone Else

12233.content: The choices are getting too narrow, this is as far as I go with this.
12233.title: Someone Else Again

125.content: Just a few more regions. (or are they called Eras? Eh, I don't really care...)
125.title: More Regions

1253.content: Okay, Last of the regions,eras,whatever. After this it up to you. (because I'm lazy)
1253.title: Even MORE Regions (or eras)

choices: More games(There's a lot of them)
13.content: Going with the spin-off series? Excellent choice my friend. The side games need a bit of more love. Pick the game of your choice.
13.title: Spin-offs

134.content:
Pokemon Go, eh?

...

I'll be honest with you, this wasn't such a odd choice at the time I made this, but now that I think about it, there aren't that many official human characters in this game. I think there's like seven of them, not counting Giovanni, who is already in other Pokemon games.
Ah well, who plays Pokemon go in 2020 anyway?





me.
I do.
It's probably the reason why I'm not writing many chapters.
It's becoming a serious problem.

I'VE BEEN RAMBLING FOR TOO LONG! Choose the group of your choice!
134.title: Pokemon GO Read Another Story!      (i'm sorry...)

135.content: There is a plentiful amount of spin-off games in Pokemon, (Arceus have mercy on us.)
135.title: More games(There's a lot of them)

1353.content: Okay, so there weren't as many Pokemon spin-off games with humans as I thought there were, so this is the last chapter I'll do on this section.
1353.title: There is another...

13532.content:
So I originally had a long thought if I should include the smash series, ultimately (hee) I decided "Eh, why not? It's got Pokemon characters." and are now allowing it, with one minor rule.

-Only Pokemon characters can Dynamax

Yeah, sue me.

Anyway, go nuts!
13532.title: The Super Smash Bros Clause

155.title: More Combos

info.brief_description: The power of Dynamax has slipped itself into the other regions, and is effecting humans.
info.description:
Introduction Scenario:

It seems the new gimmick power of Dynamax has started to spread across the other regions in the world of Pokémon, and whats worse (or better, I guess?) is that its starting to slowly effect humans. This whole phenomenon will ether end terribly, or just might take some time getting use to.

Description:

Hey. I'm making a new interactive, about Pokemon, and the new Dynamax "feature". Because despite being the obvious candidate for macro material, no one on this site seems to want to make a interactive story for it, so i guess I'm filling in the space here.

Here's a few rules and clarifications before we start:

-This interactive is mainly going to focus on giantess material, but unlike my last story(which is not doing to well.) this can also have male giants to, so a little something for everyone. Pokemon (except Zacian & Zamazenta, For "lore" reasons.) can be effected, but they aren't the main focus here.

-Clothing can be effected by Dynamax in this story, so they can grow with the user, but don't let that stop you from having it tear off during the growth sequence. Just don't make them entirely nude. (please?)

-This won't just be restricted to the main series games. This story can take place in the anime, manga, and spin-offs, as long as it's Pokemon related.

-Dynamax is usually instantaneous, has a set height, and last for three turns (however long that is in real time), but the growth can be slow or fast, last as long as you want, and they can be any height you want as well. This is a Fanfiction, GO NUTS!

So that should cover everything, hope you consider contributing and enjoy this story, and I am honored to be the first person to make a Dynamax Interactive for this website. (If that's considered an an honor for some reason)
info.pretty_title: A Pokémon Story: The Dynamax Disaster
